page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER-LOWER HEATH
page.content: In our area there are two beats (a block of land which a policeman patrols) one in Hodnet and the other in Lower Heath.Our area is not full of criminals but the{occasional burglary or{road accident}happens. Most things that are stolen are things that are left lying around.Some people also leave their cars open and the keys in the ignition.Policemen in our area wear a{tunic, helmet, black trousers {and shoes.}They also wear a{blue {shirt.}P.C. Smith has got his own {personal radio}and a bigger{radio}in his car.His car is a{Ford Fiesta,}he has a new car every 2-3 years. The {shifts}are usually 5.25 till 2.00, 8.00-4.00 or 4.00 till 12.00.We also have an outbreak of{cattle rustling every so often.The main police station for our area is Whitchurch but{C.I.D men would come from Shrewsbury.
